testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.testimonial1: Amazing platform! Got my Instagram account instantly after payment. The quality is exactly as described. Highly recommend!
testimonials.testimonial2: Been selling on Hsello for 6 months now. The platform is secure, payments are fast, and customer support is excellent.
testimonials.testimonial3: Purchased multiple Gmail accounts for my business. All working perfectly and support was very helpful when I had questions.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get premium digital products in 3 simple steps

step1.title: Browse & Select
step1.desc: Explore thousands of verified digital products from trusted sellers. Use our advanced filters to find exactly what you need.

step2.title: Secure Payment
step2.desc: Pay safely with cryptocurrency or other secure methods. Your payment is held in escrow until you confirm delivery.

step3.title: Instant Delivery
step3.desc: Receive your digital product instantly after payment confirmation. Access your files immediately and start using them right away.
